content: signs of summer shawl by on needles and hooks cindy culbertson may 2020 1 signs of summer shawl this is an easy shawl pattern using chains and double_crochet and 1 skein of sport weight yarn materials 1 skein 365m/399 yds per 100g fyberspates scrumptious yarn 45%silk 55% merino color 333 seafoam any sport weight yarn should work size h crochet hook 1 stitch marker optional tapestry needle to weave in ends gauge gauge not critical for this pattern but you may need more yarn measurements wingspan-51 inches top to tip 26 inches i used 99g of yarn to make this size pattern notes shawl is worked from the top down beginning chain 3 counts as a double_crochet throughout pattern chain 1 space of the v_stitch in the middle of each row is the center tip of the shawl it may help to put a stitch marker there pattern sequence is a repeat of row 7-16 3 row of open work 4 solid row 1 row of open work followed by 2 solid row you can add row as desired but would definitely need more yarn i have included stitch counts for each row to make it easy 2 special stitches v_stitch 2 double_crochet ch1 2 double_crochet abbreviations chain-chain double_crochet-double_crochet st-stitch slip_stitch-slip_stitch space-space v-st-v_stitch rs-right side ws-wrong side shawl pattern ch3 slip_stitch in the first st to form a ring row 1 rs chain 3 counts as a double_crochet here and throughout in the ring-make 3 double_crochet ch1 4 double_crochet turn 8 double_crochet and 1 ch1 space row 2 ws chain 3 make 2 double_crochet in same st 1 double_crochet in each of next 3 st make a v- stitch in ch1 space make 1 double_crochet in each of next 3 st 3 double_crochet in top of the beginning chain 3 turn 12 double_crochet and 1 v-st row 3 rs chain 3 make 1 double_crochet in same st make 1 double_crochet in each double_crochet to the center ch1 space of the v-st at tip make a v_stitch in the ch1 space make 1 double_crochet in each st to the last st make 2 double_crochet in top of beginning chain 3 turn 18 double_crochet and 1 v-st row 4 ws repeat row 3 24 double_crochet and 1 v-st row 5 rs repeat row 3 30 double_crochet and 1 v-st row 6 ws repeat row 3 36 double_crochet and 1 v-st row 7 rs chain 3 make 2 double_crochet in the same st 1 double_crochet in the next st chain 2 skip 2 double_crochet *double_crochet in the next 2 double_crochet chain 2 skip 2 double_crochet* repeat from * to the ch1 space of the v-st at tip make a v_stitch in the ch1 space chain 2 skip 2 double_crochet *double_crochet in the next 2 st chain 2 skip 2 double_crochet* repeat from * to the
